member.name: T:Shared.Models.GameModel
member.summary:
The shared GameModel class.
Id The ID of the game.
Name The Name of the game.
ReleaseDate The Release Date of the game.
GenreType The Genre of the game.
This class is the business DTO for game information.

member.name: P:Shared.Models.GameModel.Id
member.value: Gets the Id of the game.

member.name: P:Shared.Models.GameModel.Name
member.value: Gets the name of the game.

member.name: P:Shared.Models.GameModel.ReleaseDate
member.value: Gets the release date of the game.

member.name: P:Shared.Models.GameModel.GenreType
member.value: Gets the genre of the game.

member.name: T:Shared.Resources.Strings
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Shared.Resources.Strings.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Shared.Resources.Strings.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Shared.Resources.Strings.GameGenreType
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to GenreX.

member.name: P:Shared.Resources.Strings.GameName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to NameX.

member.name: P:Shared.Resources.Strings.GameReleaseDate
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Release DateX.
